comments: Great professor. Tries his best to put an emphasis on applicantions of communications. Always asks for feedback on his teaching and course content. Cares for student and his main goal is to make student develop interest in the field.
This course is helpful, and the professor is really nice.
Such a good Professor!! He really cares the students! And you can really learn things in this course!
Prof. Wang makes a sincere effort to prepare students for the current communication industry. Great course; lots of relevant information. Highly recommend it.
Bad teaching, random, disorganized, hardly any explanation of concepts, confused. You\'ll learn almost nothing by taking this course. Not recommended!
Good course! Dr. Wang is super nice to the class and tries his best to teach his students

AWESOME Professor. He always well prepared for his slides. He taught me to open my mind on the communication system field. He always responsible for student\'s questions both in class and in office hour. The lab is helpful, really learn a lot on the system configuration. Recommended!

I took this course and I regret myself. I can\'t believe such poor teaching in a senior year course. He showed random disorganized slides, no explanations at all--seemed to me he does not know the course contents well. Probably you would get a good grade but that does not mean anything unless you can learn something. Not recommended.
hard worker.well prepared slides and presentation.liberal marking.wish to have more personal help though.
Well organized, clear,actually teaches the material he doesn\'t just present it. The tests are very fair.
Well organized and most lectures very clear. Always available to help.

This professor seems not to understand the subject. He never gave any explanation, analysis, or calculation. He only talks and talks and talks. The textbook he used is a book not a text book. So there is no assignment in this course. After the course, we can do nothing with what he taught. It is not supposed to be like this.
His classes are boring, does not explain the concepts at all.
